meta.content: Website for Big Rapids Public Schools
Big Rapids Public Schools Home Page

img.alt: Big Rapids Public Schools Home Page

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

img.data-fbpg-desc: Welcome to Big Rapids Public Schools! We are proud to be a part of a community founded on education, with a focus on academic excellence. Parents interested in enrolling their students are encouraged to call (231) 796-2627 or click 'Enroll Now' for more information. We would be pleased to answer any questions you have about our schools.

h3.a: Big Rapids Public Schools Central Office

div.p:
500 North Warren Avenue
Big Rapids, MI 49307
P: (231) 796-9965 F: (231) 592-3494
